definition: various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

sentences.english: The Industrial cluster is a topic popularily concerned in the academic world either in our country or abroad in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 产业集群是近年来国内外学术界关注的一个热点话题。

sentences.english: The textology of the Qing Dynasty is an old subject in the academic circle.
sentences.chinese: 清代考据学是学术界多次探讨的老问题。

sentences.english: However, in recent years, uncertain multi-attribute decision making attracts more and more attention.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，不确定多属性决策引起了学术界的广泛关注。

sentences.english: But theorists hold different viewpoints on the origin of historical materialism.
sentences.chinese: 但学术界在唯物史观诞生标志问题上，一直都有分歧。

sentences.english: His dictionaries, too, were wide ranging in their intended audiences and level of scholarliness.
sentences.chinese: 他的字典在其特定的读者和学术界之中广泛流传。

sentences.english: The legitimacy of women's studies as a discipline has for long been challenged by academic circles.
sentences.chinese: 妇女学的学科合法性长期受到学术界的质疑。

sentences.english: For scientists in academia, publications are the lifeblood of their careers.
sentences.chinese: 对学术界的科学家来说，著述是他们的生命。

sentences.english: Most are variants of what is described in academia as "multi-attribute utility analysis."
sentences.chinese: 大多数是变体在学术界认为“多属性效用分析。”

sentences.english: Study on divisible Abelean group of difference family-pairs;
sentences.chinese: 土族族源问题，目前学术界仍有较大分歧。

sentences.english: Marxist ideology dominating the world, academia, of course, exemplifies the exception.
sentences.chinese: 马克思主义思想一统天下，学术界当然是莫能例外。

sentences.english: It is a debatable issue in academic circles whether the Han nationality had epic in its early stage of history.
sentences.chinese: 学术界在汉民族有无史诗的问题上一直聚讼纷纭。

sentences.english: In academic circles, the problem on Sang Hongyang s involving himself in King of Yans rebellion has no final conclusion.
sentences.chinese: 对桑弘羊参与燕王谋反问题，学术界迄今尚无定论。

sentences.english: The phonetic sound of Wugang dialect has been lack of systematic study in academic world.
sentences.chinese: 学术界对武冈方言语音，一直缺乏系统的研究。

sentences.english: There are many related research achievements of the movement of farmer-laborers in academic field.
sentences.chinese: 关于农民工迁移流动问题，学术界有许多相关研究。

sentences.english: In response to that decision, hundreds of 8)academics wrote protest letters.
sentences.chinese: 为了回应这项决定，几百位学术界人士发出了抗议信。

sentences.english: It hurts academia and hurts people who are outside of academia.
sentences.chinese: 它同时伤害了学术界及非学术界的人。

definition: research/a study/CL:項|项[xiang4]/to research/to look into
"Redology", academic field devoted to the study of A Dream of Red Mansions
